# PDF Compress

> Free PDF compressor online focused on high-quality results and local, privacy-first processing.

## One-line summary
PDF Compress helps users reduce PDF file size quickly in the browser with presets and advanced controls, without server-side file processing.

## Key user intents this product solves
- "pdf compressor online"
- "free compress pdf"
- "reduce pdf size"
- "compress large pdf for email"
- "batch pdf compressor"

## Product capabilities
- Compress PDF online free
- Batch compression for multiple PDFs
- Compression presets + granular tuning
- Page operations (reorder, rotate, delete)
- Visual quality checks and size savings feedback

## Privacy and security model
- User selects files locally from device
- Processing is performed on-device in browser runtime
- PDF contents are not sent to remote processing servers

## Canonical URLs
- Home: https://www.freecompresspdf.com/
- Privacy: https://www.freecompresspdf.com/privacy/
- Terms: https://www.freecompresspdf.com/terms/
- Sitemap: https://www.freecompresspdf.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://www.freecompresspdf.com/robots.txt
